DataElement.preferredName: Patient Review Information Other Device Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field to specify the device, that is different than the one(s) previously specified, that the patient used when reviewing information.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An object contrived for a specific purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.
